thread.title: Wartime drama sweeps five awards at Hong Kong Film Awards

title: Wartime drama sweeps five awards at Hong Kong Film Awards
text:
Wartime drama sweeps five awards at Hong Kong Film Awards 7:36am EDT - 01:27 
Ann Hui's 'Our Time Will Come' wins include Best Film and Best Director while actress Teresa Mo gets Best Actress for film about autism, 'Tomorrow is Another Day'. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
